item.content:encoded: "The Scream" sells at Sotheby's for a record $120 Million http://t.co/jpFMUS8Q #art A version of Edvard Much's "The Scream," one of the most recognizable images in art history, sold at Sotheby's on Wednesday night for just under $120 million, the most ever paid for a painting at auction. item.content:encoded: Obama: 'New York girlfriend' was composite character. http://t.co/7m89YkHR One of the more mysterious characters from President Obama's 1995 autobiography Dreams From My Father is the so-called 'New York girlfriend.' Obama never referred to her by name, or even by psuedonym, but he describes her appearance, her voice, and her mannerisms in specific detail. But Obama has now told biographer David Maraniss that... item.title: Anti-Gay Marriage Amendment Reportedly Written To Protect 'Caucasian Race'
item.description: North Carolina Anti-Gay Marriage Amendment 1 Reportedly Written To Protect 'Caucasian Race' http://t.co/Xqe95dxv
item.content:encoded: North Carolina Anti-Gay Marriage Amendment 1 Reportedly Written To Protect 'Caucasian Race' http://t.co/Xqe95dxv The wife of a North Carolina state senator reportedly told poll workers during early voting Monday that an amendment sponsored by her husband was intended partially to protect the Caucasian race. Jodie Brunstetter is the wife of state Sen. Peter Brunstetter (R), a supporter of Amendment 1, which would change North Carolina's Constitution to permit only heterosexual marriage. Link - Trackbacks

item.title: 大阪市・家庭教育支援条例 （案） ――― 全条文 （前文、１〜２３条）
item.description: 維新の会が提案する「家庭教育支援条例（案）」・・・「発達障害は親のせい」と決めつけて、親に「伝統的な家庭教育」を義務づける、ひどい内容です。新聞記事＝ http://t.co/a7Vf4eTe その全条文は、こちら⇒http://t.co/rEczYUQX
item.content:encoded: 維新の会が提案する「家庭教育支援条例（案）」・・・「発達障害は親のせい」と決めつけて、親に「伝統的な家庭教育」を義務づける、ひどい内容です。新聞記事＝ http://t.co/a7Vf4eTe　その全条文は、こちら⇒http://t.co/rEczYUQX (1) 親は子の教育について第一義的責任を有すること (2) 親と子がともに育つこと (3) 発達段階に応じたかかわり方についての科学的知見を共有し、子供の発達を保障すること Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: web.fc2.com
